Method Detail

hasCapacity

CapacityValue hasCapacity()
Returns the CapacityValue of the ArticleProducer.

Returns:
CapacityValue PRODUCER_SHUTDOWN if the ArticleProducer has entered the shutdown mode CACHE_LIMIT_REACHED if the cache limit has been reached TASK_LIMIT_REACHED if the number of tasks limit has been reached FREE otherwise

addArticle

boolean addArticle(Task<Revision> task)
Adds a revision task.

Parameters:
task - Reference to a RevisionTask
Returns:
TRUE if the task could be added FALSE otherwise

addPartialArticle

boolean addPartialArticle(Task<Revision> task)
Adds a partial revision task.

Parameters:
task - Reference to a DiffTask
Returns:
TRUE if the task could be added FALSE otherwise

getArticle

Task<Revision> getArticle()
Returns a RevisionTask.

Returns:
RevisionTask or NULL if no task is available

getPartialArticle

Task<Revision> getPartialArticle(int taskId,
                                 int partCounter)
Returns the requested partial RevisionTask.

Parameters:
taskId - ArticleID
partCounter - Number of part
Returns:
RevisionTask or NULL if the task is not contained in the storage

addBannedTask

void addBannedTask(int articleId)
Adds an ArticleID to the blacklist.

Parameters:
articleId - ID of an Article
